ygData.subject: Re: Playing Hide and Sneak
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are a bard (I can probably assume so) you have to realize that singing or using your music ability at all (which you will be doing continuosly ifyou are
ygData.messageBody:
If you are a bard (I can probably assume so) you have to realize that
singing or using your music ability at all (which you will be doing
continuosly ifyou are a good bard) will prevent you from using the hide
command (I don't know about sneak...but would assume it is the same). I hope
that helps...try turning off your songs and seeing if you can at least try
it.

Kalduran of The Rathe

"Mr. Beeba" wrote:

> From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>
>
> Ok heres my problem...2 months ago i hit the hide button and the thing
> never recycled back through.´┐¢ Well, when i recieved the sneak skill two
> lvls ago, i put 3 points into it hoping to try it out...nothing.´┐¢ The
> hide skill is not allowing me to use it.´┐¢ So i thought maybe if i put
> some more points into the sneak skill it would cycle the button through
> faster.´┐¢ It didn't.´┐¢ So far i have put 8 skill points into sneak and
> have not been able to use it once.´┐¢ Is this normal?´┐¢ or do you all think
> that maybe mine is screwed up?
>
> Tadian of Veeshan
